name: Big Space Root
description:
Controls:
Space - start game
Right/Left arrows - control root

As a mysterious space creature, your sole purpose is to feed on the cores of planets. Your journey takes you through the vast reaches of the galaxy, searching for your next feast. You spot your first target - a lush, thriving planet. Diving deep into its core, you feast on its energy and feel revitalized. But your hunger for power is insatiable, and your quest for the ultimate meal continues. Soar through the cosmos, leaving a trail of conquered planets in your wake. Move your main root with arrow keys to avoid obstacles and collect pickups.
